website_summaries.verdict: Use this collapsible steamer basket both in your Instant Pot and in standard stove top pans.
pros: Fits a variety of pressure cookers and stove top pans
Keeps liquid below what you're steaming
Comes in a variety of sizes
Can hold a lot of vegetables
Easy to lift out using included tools
cons: The stainless steel may be rust-free, but the nut securing the handle isn't, and it can spread rusty liquid elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use inside my instant pot. It works great! I like how it can fold in to create a bowl-like shape and also fan out plate-like. It's a very flexible steamer in terms of size. Easy to clean. There's a hook you can use to pull the steamer out of the pot, so that makes it very convenient since there's no need for heat-resistant gloves. It also comes with a free stainless steel julienne peeler! Very glad I chose to puchase this steamer. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Beware of poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is NOT reliable/sturdy. I bought one of these about a year ago and the center loop part came unattached within a few months. I decided to buy a new basket again sometime this October. Product broke again after only using it for around one month. This time though, one of the legs came undone. This product definitely needs improvement/be removed from Amazon. I am looking for another vegetable steamer basket now...
customer_reviews.author: Jeroen

customer_reviews.title: I like that it takes up the whole circumference of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a steamer to fit inside of my InstantPot and this product does just that...but I could also use it in a regular pot. I like that it takes up the whole circumference of the pot so food, and has a nice curve so that food won't fall out of the sides when lifting it out of the pot. It collapses into a pretty compact nest so that it is easy to store. I also appreciated the bonus vegetable peeler that came in the package.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Improved
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to fill a large stockpot- and yet, will also work in a smaller pot. The legs are longer than my previous steamer- a real plus as that means you can fill the pot with more water - also- its stainless steel- again, better than my previous aluminum steamer.
customer_reviews.author: CSB

customer_reviews.title: Works well in my pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this to steam vegetables in Power Pressure XL, 8 quart, and it works great. I love the way it fans out and fits well when opened inside my pressure cooker and folds small for storage. The extra hook to pull it out of the deep pot is a nice added feature. I also use this to make hard boiled eggs in my pressure cooker. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G.

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: I received my steamer last week, have used it twice already, and am very happy with it. I've been getting fresh vegetables from a local farm delivery service and microwaving them to steam was just not the best. I had never owned a true stove-top steamer before this one and I'm so pleased with how easy it is to use and how much better my vegetables taste. I was also impressed that a co-founder of the company sent me an email after I placed the order to send me a recipe book and then another email about a week after I received it to ensure that I had received it and to solicit my feedback.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mathewson

customer_reviews.title: These are PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT !!! I bought the large and small versions of this steamer. They fit in any/every pot we have !! Simple to use, simple to clean up, The hook is the perfect size and they fit nicely in our cupboard without having to take up space. I would buy these again. Also get a few little extra's, peeler/grater combo tool, and a longer handle for those deeper pots. These work great too !!! I use the peeler combo tool for making veggie strips for salads.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. RED

customer_reviews.title: My boys’ favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to steam vegetables. I was able to use it about 3x before one of my boys discovered this shiny spaceship and I haven’t been able to use it since the legs all broke off. It worked very well, but was difficult to clean broccoli out of all the holes. My boys constantly fight over this thing. It’s one of their favorite toys. Do you think I’m joking? I’m not. It’s a spinny, shiny, hangy, spaceship that opens and closes using technology that is clearly alien. An okay steamer and an excellent toy for toddlers and preschoolers.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Not we’ll made
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the center post that screws into the bottom is cheaply made. When I screwed it it in, the threads were stripped or it was too small so it won’t stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It will go perfectly with my Instant Pot :) I use this regularly in my Instant Pot, I added pictures of the steamed buns I made using the steamer basket.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S

customer_reviews.title: rust at the bottom of the steamer
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as stainless steel. However, after a few uses this steamer had rust at the bottom. Would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Rechin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent steamer for my Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer specifically to use in my Instant Pot pressure cooker. It fits perfectly inside and the hook makes it easy to take out when it's done. I can make more hard and soft boiled eggs on the steamer than on a trivet. It definitely holds a lot of food overall. And it's actually taking the place of my trivet when I do pot-in-pot cooking in my pressure cooker. The steamer feels very sturdy and is well- balanced. Very easy to clean, too, and it folds in small enough that it takes very little storage space. I'm very pleased with this steamer and feel it was a good choice to use in my pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Flippitti

customer_reviews.title: Great product and came with extras!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product that has worked well through my first couple uses. It opens a little strained but for me that wasn’t an issue and I don’t think it would unless you were expecting to have bought one of these from a cutco or a kitchen craft or some other exceptionally high quality gadget you have to pay a fortune for. This also came with a few giveaway items, a peeler and a hook to pick it up when it’s hot. Great buy and would recommend for anyone with an instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Basket is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this basket it fits my large power cooker to a tee. I’ve only used it so far to cook eggs. I always had trouble getting my eggs cooked just right so they peel perfectly, well, they were just right. I was very skeptical about but not any more. This is the way I’m fixing my eggs from now on with this basket at my side. It’s easy to lift it out. You could also use this basket to set out because it’s so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: If you find you Don't like steamed food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer accessory to use in my Instant Pot. It is very versatile and can be used with many types of pans. I did have a bit trouble, minute or so, figuring exactly how to fit it together in its different figurations. If you find you Don't like steamed food, this acts as a wonderful candy holder around Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: David A Danner

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after first washing
customer_reviews.text: Rust appeared on this product after the first washing. No, I did not leave this in water for an excessive amount of time, or use any abrasive cleaning tool. I know that stainless still will rust, but after only 1 washing? Not sure if this is food grade stainless steel, but beware if you're concerned about early rusting.
customer_reviews.author: TrueBlue

customer_reviews.title: Love it, use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this basket. When I purchased instant pot to "cook" at home I learned that you need a steamer for a lot of things. Decided to bye the streamer basket since I love fresh vegetables and really wanted to steam broccoli and cauliflower. What I like about the basket is the fact that it compacts for storage, which great for saving space. And since the basket expands it works well with different size pots. Also, the handle works great for when you steam salmon and don't want to tear it to shreds. Love it, use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sim

customer_reviews.title: Supe wer for more than
customer_reviews.text: I'm really loving this steamer...When I had to downsize from 4200+ sq ft to a /<1000 sq ft living space, this was an item I didn't give much thought to. WELL, I missed it terribly and didn't know where it was in my storage so purchased another. Since then I've also discovered a virtually fool proof method of boiling/steaming hard-boiled eggs so I'm doubly happy. Was a great product when I was only doing veges.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Cory

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, use & clean 😊
customer_reviews.text: This steamer was the perfect addition for my steaming needs, however I did not receive the E-book cook book as per advertised when I ordered which I was looking forward to getting new ideas from! ☹️ This is why I gave it 3 stars, hopefully the company will send it out after reading this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expandable metal steamer... NICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice large metal steamer. I've used smaller ones before and love this type of steamer. The expandable lotus design enables one to use various sizes of pans to use it in. Personally, I purchased this for use in my new Instant Pot for reheating and steaming foods in less time. A nice extra from this seller is the extra lifting tool to remove the steamer from the pan without burning ones fingers on the hot metal. He also send a peeler as a bonus. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: G Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, handy addition for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Just picked this up in the last week, was a nice price as a Lightning Deal, have only used the steamer, not tried the julienne peeler yet, but like the lifting hook they sent with it to keep from burning yourself. Seems sturdy build for the price too, and the e-book they send to you via email after the purchase has a few good tips and what look to be decent recipes in it.
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Moynan

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: We're very disappointed with this steamer. When it first arrived, we noticed that the solid center loop did not screw tightly into the folding base. After a few uses, this fit became SO loose that the steamer cold not be securely lifted with food in it. It may just be a defective unit, or this problem may instead be systemic with all of this particular product. We may need to instead buy a similar one from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Binik

customer_reviews.title: pretty, and would have done the job had I ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a very similar steamer since 1961, which I replaced with a plastic one a year or so ago. The new plastic one was cute, pretty, and would have done the job had I not neglected to put water in the bottom of the pan and burned the little legs off of it ! My bad ! Stainless steel is what a clutz like me needs. I also appreciate the handy handle to remove it from the steaming pan. I have not yet used to other extras but love getting something "extra" like a surprise. Thanks much.
customer_reviews.author: Lodi

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR THE INSTANT POT
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! Fits perfectly inside the 8qt Instant Pot, and because it's flexible / adjustable, no sweat to drop it into the 6qt version or other pots. Built-in legs keep it elevated perfectly. Compacts well for storage. Comes with a complimentary peeler and full warranty. Nice unit!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: steamer looks good, free peeler looks dangerous to use
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet but steamer looks good. The free peeler looks dangerous to use; plan on discarding. Did not get the free e-cookbook but emailed company and they immediately sent one to me. They said I had signed up to not get 3rd party emails, don't remember doing that when ordering this product. I bought this steamer as it was advertised to be used with Instant Pot however free cookbook recipes are not for use with Instant Pot; only for use with steaming on stove.
customer_reviews.author: Nano

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer basket!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for years and must have left it behind when we moved. I like this one even better because the legs on the bottom are taller so more water can be in pot and I don't have to worry about it boiling dry. There is also a nice hook to facilitate removing from the pot which the old one did not have.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schoellhorn

customer_reviews.title: Steamed Veggies Taste Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Works great and holds a surprising large amount of veggies. I've been using it nearly every day and it's getting me to eat my vegetables again. Steamed veggies taste so much better than boiled or microwaved do. If I could change just one thing it would be to make the hook utensil a bit more hook shaped so it was easier to use it to pull the steamer from the pot. I haven't used the free peeler yet, but it looks to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Austintacious

customer_reviews.title: SS vegetable steamer works great.
customer_reviews.text: Received on the early side of the delivery window. exactly as advertised. I ended up ordering both sizes so I can use in large & small pans. Box said lifetime warranty on the strainer. didn't notice that when I bought it. Great added plus. We have used it several times already works great.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking easier
customer_reviews.text: It is SO much easier cooking veggies using this steam basket than not using it. I love this basket and how easy and compact it is to store it. I can use in various sizes pots as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LGraham

customer_reviews.title: As expected, happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old one I've had for probably 20 years. Washed it when it arrived and used it to boil eggs in the IP with no issues. Item seems sturdy, and was exactly what I was looking for. The little handle with the hook is an awesome addition from my old one. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Covey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, but still works
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, but still works. You just have to be very careful as it bends easily especially in the center. The removeable handle bends with normal use and is already stripped out and no longer tightens and I've barely used it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherril ✌️💕🌞

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen helper
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is perfect for steaming smaller dishes, and canned be fanned out like a dinner plate for steaming larger items. The hook that’s included is helpful for plucking out the steamer without worrying about burning yourself. I’m using it as a steam basket to cook fruits and veggies to make baby food. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: 2012mom

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with steamer purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new steamer. It fits a variety of pot sizes and the 2 best things about it are the covers on the feet to do and damage to the pot bottoms and the telescoping handle. I was looking for one to use in my new pressure cooker so the bottom of it wouldn't get scratched, and this fits perfectly. A great buy that I am well pleased with! And I also received the bonus peeler too, which works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this "Vegetable Steamer Basket Large Complete Bundle by Kitchen Deluxe" because I need a product that is convenient and can steam any type of vegetables. This can fit in easily in any size of a container and is dish washer safe so that is a big plus! I found this product is made really well. It folds out big but is compact for easy storage when not in use. Plus you get an freebie a peeler with it! I mean who doesn't love free! I got this product free to review and give my honest option.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love the convenience of this steam basket.
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of this steam basket. I tried to steam vegetable in my "One Pot" even when I set it for a very short time. I like the fact I can put them in the steam basket on my cooktop and steam them just till crisp tender. I also appreciate the steam chart the company emailed me. Now I don't need to guess how long to steam them.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Decent steamer but it has started to rust in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I know people have said it is small but ita perfect for regular home use. I've cooked tamales with it, vegetables and crab. Its great. But i see some rust already so that is getting me nervous.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Manuel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Worst product.
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is too sharp and it cut my fingers... turned out rusty within 6 months even after cleaning and drying immediately it got rust.
customer_reviews.author: S.A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer to go in my Instant Pot and it fits perfectly! I love that it folds up really small, so it doesn't take up much of my precious storage space. The feet have it sit high enough in the instant pot as to not come in contact with the required amount of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P-M

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's small, but is good for smaller items. The hook is good to remove it, but seems to get misplaced a lot as it is not attached. The peeler didn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Barra

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy nice steaming basket
customer_reviews.text: I really like this steaming basket. It does just what I needed to do. I really like how it folds up on itself. It makes it easy to store. It also came with a julienne peeler which I wasn't even expecting! I would recommend this product if you are thinking about purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent steamer! I would highly recommend this steamer, as it does steam well, however, you must be careful when removing the steamer from the pot so as to not tip it and spill the contents. I use a pot holder glove to balance the steamer without getting burned. Other than that this is a good steamer and the peeler is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Rising after first use.
customer_reviews.text: This steamer rusted at the base after the first use. Very dissatisfied and wish the supplier could do something to remedy this. I don’t feel comfortable steaming additional runs with rust liquid as my base. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Its very easy to use and steams the veggies well. Happy with the purchase. Only hoping it doesnt rust.
customer_reviews.author: Dhanashri

customer_reviews.title: Works great and cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I use this steamer to make homemade baby food. I am very pleased so far with the steamer. I can fit a good amount of vegetables and fruits in the basket and it cleans up very easily after use. I received a very positive email from the seller checking up on how the product was working. They sent along a FAQ sheet that did help me use it a little better. I'd definitely recommend the product to anyone who needs to steam food on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Steamer for wok or pan
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. And comes with 2 gifts!!! A meat holder and a awesome peeler that peels veggies in long strings, or other cool ways!!
customer_reviews.author: M Sammis

customer_reviews.title: NOT a STANLESS STELL, it's a iron.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT stainless steel, it's attracted by Magnet, seems like made up with iron and some kind of polish on it. It gets black after few use. DO NOT BUY this product as this polish can be dangerous for health. I 'm going to talk to customer service for incorrect information.
customer_reviews.author: Ravinder Bhalla

customer_reviews.title: Instant Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vegatable steamer to use in my Instant Pot and it’s a winner! I love the fact I came with a “hook” to lift the steamer out of the pot safely and the peeler it came with us a nice bonus. It comes in a compact box but it is a substantial piece. You won’t be disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the handle extension so that i don't have to stick my hand into the pot. I'm looking forward to trying the gricer.
customer_reviews.author: song sparrow's

customer_reviews.title: This is a great steamer. I wanted a steamer that was 100% ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great steamer. I wanted a steamer that was 100% stainless steel. Some claim they are but the legs &/or stem will be aluminum - this is true to their description. The parts are solid, not flimsy, but still easily "folded" back and forth. Coming with the peeler is a plus also. I am anxious to try it for shaved-thin zucchini noodles (instead of my cumbersome Spiraliser).
customer_reviews.author: S. House

customer_reviews.title: Great for Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my Instant Pot and it works great! I love the fact that you can adjust the size for what you are cooking. The feet sit nicely in the pot and the handle makes it easy to take out. I also like how it collapsed into a smaller size for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this in a regular stove top pot and in my instant pot. Works great either way. Clean up is as expected. I have thrown it into the dishwasher to wash and so far it’s worked out fine and has not been damaged. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: If you have an Instant Pot you NEED one of these. Fits in my 6 quart Instant Pot IP-Duo perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Luebke Jr. Scrimshaw & Engraving

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy-to-use steamer
customer_reviews.text: Steamers make life so easy - fresh steamed vegetables in just a few minutes. This steamer is sturdier than others I have used with a fixed center post which is also more convenient than my previous steamer with a floating ring in the center. I recommend this steamer. It works great and it's great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbie

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good but it is hard to clean if you use ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good but it is hard to clean if you use it for anything other than vegetables. (Steamed fish) it was delicious but cleaning will keep me from doing again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrabriz

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very functional
customer_reviews.text: The basket itself is great. I also received a combo peeler. I am not sure it is any good, but then ot was an unexpected extra.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer Basket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great steamer basket. It comes with a hook and a ring that allows for easy access to the basket when you need to remove it from the pot. Good quality at a good price for an item that is not always easy to find at local major retailers.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Deluxe Veggie Steamer Basket - Large
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A VERY NICE PRODUCT!!!!!!N. LARGE, HEAVY, STAINLESS, WE WILL USE3 THIS FOR A LONG TIME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry G. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Quality set with great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: A solid steamer and julienne slicer. The steamer comes with a hook to remove it from the pot. Worked out for me because I was going to buy both items separately anyway! The set was nicely packaged and the quality seems good. Customer service has been top-notch. I got prompt personal emails from the seller checking to ensure that the package arrived safely and in good condition, as well as making sure that I was satisfied with everything. If there had been any problems with the order, I am sure they would have taken care of it right away. Definitely recommend this set for your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for steaming broccoli!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the steamer basked long enough to rate durability, but I'm very happy with the quality so far. I bought it thinking I could use it to cook hard boiled eggs and haven't tried that yet, but I've steamed broccoli (my favorite veggie) several times and it comes out perfect and the steamer basked is so easy to remove from the pot with no fear of burned fingers! Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve really gotten a lot of use out of this steamer and have been using it mainly for vegetables. It’s pretty sturdy and easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: missamy

customer_reviews.title: i love this steamer
customer_reviews.text: i love this steamer!! it fits perfectly inside a 4 qt pot. i found i am steaming all my vegetables - which is so much healthier and nutritious than other methods- and it is so fast. thank you to kitchen deluxe for such a great product and high quality! and also thank you for the vegetable steaming tips!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I had expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it is constructed but it is a little smaller than I anticipated. I have not used it yet as I just got it, but I think it will work out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katmandoo

customer_reviews.title: The attachments should be made of the same material, thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Ive only used my steamer once for cauliflower and it was done fairly quick. There is nothing I dislike about my steamer package. All the extras made it so much more creative and useful. I would like to see a bigger size for large pots otherwise thanks alot! I wanted to give 5 stars but the hooks are a different metal and the tip was discolored.
customer_reviews.author: QUEEN

customer_reviews.title: Steams vegetables perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly steamed broccoli in 5 minutes. Easy to clean and it works great with the pots I already have. It will fit in any size pot. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product -Good value
customer_reviews.text: Steamer basket was as advertised by seller. Appears to be made of good quality materials - works well in several different size pots. Easy cleanup and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I use my electric pressure cooker on a daily basis and this accessory is one of the many great ones. It is good quality, fits nicely in the inner pot, is easy to use, and is inexpensive. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Mine was missing parts. Had to return. Bought another at half the price from local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A versatile kitchen gadget.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for my deep saute pan. Once it is loaded with enough vegetables (or whatever I am steaming) it easily fans out to its full diameter. If the portion is lighter, the basket slightly hugs the food to be evenly steamed. Unlike my previous basket steamer, this one includes a 'hook utensil' allowing easy removal of basket without branding my hand with second-degree burns. In addition, the Julienne peeler is incredibly versatile. I use it not only on vegetables, but also on grating Parmesan cheese--or any other hard cheese. The recipe E-book provides a multitude of steaming options I never would have thought of otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Critiqula

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful steamer!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this steamer!! It works WONDERFUL !!I HIGHLY RECCOMEND IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: murphy

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product received
customer_reviews.text: The product described on amazon and on the box my item was packaged in was vastly different than what was actually in the box. The feet on the steamer were not collapsible, we’re not covered in non scratch silicone and the removable handle was clearly different than what was depicted. Extremely disappointed in the blatantly intentional false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s convenient
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly for every portion size and it makes steaming so much more convenient. It cools down fast and has a rod to pick it up by which is very appreciated. It is definitely better than I had thought it would be!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Austin

customer_reviews.title: Works good and we love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this device. We've used it so many times since getting it two weeks ago. We are on the keto diet and steam veggies like crazy. Literally just finished making steamed broccoli.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Much
customer_reviews.text: We liked this steamer so much, we bought a second one! Excellent quality! Much, much thicker than previous baskets I have bought. I am very impressed by this steamer basket and you will be too!
customer_reviews.author: Dots B

customer_reviews.title: I love that it folds up.
customer_reviews.text: I love this can be folded. I have little cabinet space so that is a must. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: SUSANNA BAILEY

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Works well and fits most of my pots. Makes steaming vegetables quicker and simpler than bringing out the steamer pot.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDay

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is a great steamer. Ordered it as a Christmas present, now I need to get my own.

customer_reviews.title: This steamer basket fits perfect in my Tramontina Electric Pressure Cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this collapsible steamer basket for my Tramontina Electric Pressure Cooker because I cook the majority of my vegetables in the quick and easy pressure cooker. The steamer basket fits perfect and is easy to store. Delivery was quick and product was as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It steams very well and is very easy for clean up

customer_reviews.title: Steamed Basket
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great for veg and in my pressure cooker my meat don’t burn
customer_reviews.author: Myriam Fales

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect easy steamer!
customer_reviews.text: The steamer basket fits perfectly in my instapot. It's the first time I actually like steamed vegetables. I tried green beans first and I'm sorry to say I ate all of them at one time they tasted so fresh. Asparagus was better in the steamer then roasted. It's a perfect little Gadget and cleans perfectly in your dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Just Right for Pressure Cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use with my electric pressure cooker. It is perfect. I have only had it a few days but have used it numerous times now to steam vegetables and it also makes great hard boiled eggs in the pressure cooker. The e-book that came as a bonus was also great. I got several useful tips and recipes from it! Great product and great company to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Steveweis2001

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use it frequently and am glad I bought it. Cleans up nice and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Steamer Basket With No-Scratch Feet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy steamer with nice features. I like the silicone-coated legs which prevent scratches in the pan, in fact, that is the reason I chose it. I use the steamer basket for hard cooking eggs. The detachable handle in the center is a premium feature.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It is not as flimsy as the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is not as flimsy as the one we have been using, so needless to say we are happy with it. The long grabber for it is genius! The julienne peeler I haven't used as yet but it is sharper than the one I have. This wil be awesome to use!
customer_reviews.author: F. Heather Taclas

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective with one of the bottom stabilizing pegs missing. Sent it back to Amazon. Otherwise looked well-made. Probably a manufacturing error. Will try a replacement.

customer_reviews.title: The Basket is perfect for stemaing.
customer_reviews.text: This Basket is perfect for steaming.But the issue is with the rust.With in one month of use the basket has rust all over the place.how ever i clean it keeps coming up and its getting into the food as well.Cheap stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Shankar Narayanan Devan

customer_reviews.title: Learn something new every day.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, a dream to clean, takes up such a small space... I am new to the Instant pot phenomenon but so far, it's brilliant.Steaming fresh veggies is great as far as ease and nutrition.I'm very happy that I purchased this.

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 6 qt Instant Pot perfectly, the lifting hook is an excellent idea. The peeler I haven't uuse yet put it seems to be a well made product. An excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: I use this so much!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time. It is definitely a must have if you like making veggies in your instant pot. Easy to clean and very sturdy. I’ve made broccoli, carrots, Brussels sprouts and other veggies with this. Love it and very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steam Away!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly. The removal tool is a real help. The vegetable peeler was not effective or even worth giving as a gift. The tines were misshapen and not strong enough to work with vegetables. The steamer basket is flexible and can be used with several size pans. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I never had a steamer basket before. I so glad I finally bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Flagler Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer. Perfect packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great steamer. Perfect packaging, and the vegetable peeler is a sweet add-on. I wanted this steamer for use in my instant pot and I'm really happy about the lifter. I've had steamers like this before which were "sticky" as the basket unfolds, not this one; it's perfectly smooth. Very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the 3 quart Instant Pot!

product_meta.title: Kitchen Deluxe Vegetable Steamer Basket - Fits Instant Pot Pressure Cooker 3, 5, 6 Qt & 8 Quart - 100% Stainless Steel - Accessories Include Safety Tool + Julienne Peeler + eBook | For Instapot
feature_bullets: ⭐⭐⭐ FLASH SALE - OVER 50% OFF - LIGHTNING DEAL - LIMITED TIME ⭐⭐⭐ EASY TO USE & DISHWASHER SAFE - The Kitchen Deluxe steamer insert for vegetables uses Premium quality stainless steel that presents as a Beautiful brushed metal. From Busy Moms cooking Baby Food to College Students to Home Cooks. These duo gadgets are a definite for anyone who wants to get More Veggies into their Diet.

EXCLUSIVE BUNDLE - SAFETY TOOL + JULIENNE PEELER + RECIPE EBOOK - Premium 100% Stainless Steel Vegetable Steamer Basket (diameter - 5.5" to 9.3", leg height - 0.9"). Ultra sharp Julienne Veggie Peeler (worth $9.95). Safety Tool allows easy removal using Removable Solid Center Loop. Downloadable Steaming Cookbook (SENT VIA EMAIL) full of healthy, tasty recipes.

EASY TO CLEAN & COMPACT STORAGE - Expands & adjusts to fit various pot and pan sizes unlike silicone steamers & baskets; turning any pan into a veg steamer in an instant. Opens like a water lily and is collapsible to become small and compact to save storage space unlike bulky bamboo steamers.

PERFECT FIT FOR INSTANT POT (ip) - 3, 5, 6 & 8 Quart (qt). Electric power pressure cooker friendly. Fits Insta Pot Ultra, Duo, Lux, Plus & Mini. From Boiled Eggs to Vegetables, Seafood, Crab, Tamale and much more. Use as multiple accessories - Egg rack, trivet, colander or strainer. Awesome Gift for your family and friends, especially those with an Instapot.
LIFETIME WARRANTY - If you don't absolutely love your new vegetable steam basket, you can simply return your items and we'll happily refund every penny. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. Add to Cart now!
